creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: ink drawing with pale peach highlights; head and upper body of a man on the diagonal, holding sword to left with both hands; man wears a white headband
medium: Preparatory drawing for a print; ink and color on paper
signed: 応需一魁斎芳年画 {ōju Ikkaisai Yoshitoshi ga}
title: Matsubara Tachū
